tool_description: Validates and processes patient medication information including current medications, dosages, frequencies, and checks for potential drug interactions and allergies.

frequencies.description: How often each medication is taken

check_interactions.description: Whether to perform drug interaction checking

include_supplements.description: Whether to include vitamins and supplements

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system.
Array length mismatch: medication_names, dosages, and frequencies must have the same length.
Unrecognized medication: One or more medications are not found in the drug database.
Invalid dosage format: Dosages must include amount and unit (e.g., '10mg', '1 tablet').
Invalid frequency format: Use standard frequency terms (daily, twice daily, as needed, etc.).
Date format error: Start dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Too many medications: Maximum of 50 medications can be processed at once.
usage: Provide patient ID and parallel arrays of medication names, dosages, and frequencies. Ensure array lengths match and use standard medical terminology for accuracy.

drug_interactions.description: List of potential drug interactions found

medication_summary.description: Formatted summary of patient's medication list

warnings.description: Any warnings or concerns about the medication list
